si.title: ගම්පහා දිස්ත්රික්කයේ අවසාන මැතිවරණ ප්රති results ල

en.title: The final election results of the Gampaha district

summary_lines: Here's a summary of the Gampaha district election results in approximately 200 characters:
1. Party A won 45 seats out of 100
5. Party A's leader became the district MP
